lines: I’M WALKING EVERY DAY WITH JESUS
1. Ndiyenda naye Yesu Mbuye, Ndikondwa nthawi zonsezo
Ndipeza ciyanjano caceco, Ndikwanitsidwa ndi Iye.
Ndiyende naye Yesu Mbuye, Ndifuna atsogoze ’ne
Pokagamira pa Mplumutsiyo Sinditaika konse bi
2. Ndiyenda naye Yesu Mbuye, Ndicite cifuniro ’ce.
3. Ndiyenda naye Yesu Mbuye, Ndabvomereza chimolo,
Pamodzi tidzayenda konseko, Mu ciyanjano caceco.
